General.Name: Jiangsu Rutong Petro-Machinery
General.Description: Jiangsu Rutong Petro-Machinery Co., Ltd researches, develops, manufactures, and sells oil drilling and production equipment and tools. The company offers wellhead automation equipment, hoisting tools, holding tool, make up and break out tools, and other tools. It serves in China, North America, Southeast Asia, the Middle East, Central Asia, and North Africa. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Nantong, China.

4.Name: Mr. Xiaofeng  Chen
